ygData.subject: Re: General information about Kerra Island
ygData.msgSnippet: A Magician friend of mine spent some time on Kerra Island killing the cat people for their gems... I went there once and found : they run away pretty quick and
ygData.messageBody:
A Magician friend of mine spent some time on Kerra
Island killing the cat people for their gems...

I went there once and found :

they run away pretty quick and bring back (stronger)
friends...
at level 10 most things were either green or red ..

while I was there a high level group from one of the
Guilds came and said they were gonna sweep the island
and kill the boss man...... they all died - there
were dead bodies everywhere...

I would sau, unless you have root, or snare or a pet
to chase them down - it is not worth the
travelling....

===
Merilyn, Sister of the Ashen Order,
Monk of the 13th circle on Xegony,
Knights of Prexus
~~The person who knows how to laugh at himself
will never cease to be amused~~
